name: The Shadow (Sight21)
description:
Iroshi is living a normal regular life, but when a shadow whisks him away to reality, things get worse for Iroshi. What is the shadow? Why did he bring him to what he called "reality"? These questions can be answered in "The Shadow"

Programmed and written by Rafael "RC" Cardoso

GameTester and Co-Progrmmer:

Sawyer French

IF there is any need to take this down I will. And if there is a gamepage of this somewhere else let me know. If there is, I didn't know and I am not trying to steal anything. Just found this in my external hard drive.
